root.text: She wants to know how your day was.

talked.text: Do you want to talk for a while?

choices1.text: Good, the usual, I'm going to my room.
Today Alex and Ana tried to blackmail me.
Today Alex and Ana blackmailed me

mariaNotPranked.text: They've tried me to stick a poster of Maria.
Called themselves school kings or something.

mariaPranked.text: They've made me stick a poster of Maria...
I had no other chance if I wanted my mobile back.

choices2.text: I've lost the mobile phone today.
I'm going to my room, we've talked enough.

lostPhone.text: They took my phone away and I couldn't get it back.

lostPhone2.text: Well you won't have a mobile phone then. You have to be more careful with your belongings.

foundPhone.text: Today they've taken away my phone.

foundPhone.text_male: And someone left it on the girls' bathroom
foundPhone.text_female: And someone left it on the boys' bathroom

foundPhone2.text: You have to be more careful about your belongings. You can't leave them anywhere.

exchangedPassword.text: Alison has surprised me. I can really trust her.

exchangedPassword2.text: How dare you!? What if she shares them or passes herself off as you.
Don't you think what you do?.

exchangedPassword3.text: But I have her passwords too. I trust her.
She's the only one who wants to be my friend.

commonPhone2.text: That's no reason to leave your stuff unwatched. Anyway...

suggestMeeting.text: I think we should speak with the school about what's happening.

meetingChoices.text: Yes, please, I can't take it any longer.

acceptMeeting.text: Don't worry honey, we will fix it all.

rejectMeeting.text: Alright, we won't go for now.

rejectMeeting2.text: But if anything serious happens...we won't get stopped.

meetingSuccess.text: More reason to go tomorrow to the principal's office and fix all this.

root.text: I think I had one in the entrance's table...third drawer...
Here it is...does it work?... Yeaaaah, goodness.
looks like u didnt kickme out, cheers. as a gift ill tell you I love sucking penises :)

message2.text: actually i'm into everything, if anyone wants lemme know

message3.text: thanks 4 confessing, but we already knew, it's written all over your face

message4.text: we got the perfect name, SUFACE, the face who sucks LOL

message5.text: whats this? why r u saying these things?

message6.text: the best day and i missed it...what did i loose?

message7.text_male: youre crossing a line already, who trolled him?
message7.text_female: youre crossing a line already, who trolled her?

message8.text: none, whats up guille? u got sucked & dont want it to be known? hahaha

choices.text: As you heard, I love it

notMe.text: someone's used my phone to write this

notMe2.text: We have photos of what u said, we're gonna share them with all the other classrooms, hahaha

notMe3.text: hahaha it's too late now to deny anything :P

fkU.text: Álex, Ana, fuck you both, I know it's your thing

fkU2.text: maybe it is, so? we already have photos of the conversation

fkU3.text: tomorrow everyone will know about your personal tastes hahaha

agree.text: Yes, I love it, problem? Como oís, me encanta, algún problema? YOU ARE JEALOUS!!

root.text_male: youre hot, 2morrow in the toilet ya know ;)
root.text_female: imma femme & i know u 2, 2morrow in the toilet ya know ;)

message2.text: this is so unlike you {{name}}, u got trolled right?

notMe.text: Sorry María, I didn't write it, they might write you when they stole my phone

notMe3.text: i believe u, relax, get some rest

wasMe.text: Yes, I wrote it, see you tomorrow <3
